body: MCC release

1.	***NEW***: Tutorial mode
2.	***NEW***: Android Oreo app shortcuts
3.	***NEW***: Customizable settings
4.	***REVERT***: Top User Benefits on first run
5.	***FIX***: Crashing on about preset

name: 2.3 Beta 4
body:
1.	***NEW***: Tutorial mode (Beta)
2.	***NEW***: Continuing pad colors while playing
3.	***NEW***: Android Oreo adaptive icons
4.	***NEW***: Android Oreo app shortcuts
5.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Redefined music genres
6.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Better performing preset store
7.	***REVERT***: Added pad patterns
8.	***FIX***: Missing / lagging animations
9.	***FIX***: Bugs and glitches

name: 2.3 Beta 3
body:
1.	***NEW***: Colored download button
2.	***FIX***: About screen crash
3.	***FIX***: Color customization crash
4.	***FIX***: Download notification making sound above Android O

name: 2.3 Beta 2
body:
1.	***NEW***: Customizable settings
2.	***NEW***: Check updates on startup
3.	***FIX***: Looping touch bug
4.	***FIX***: Empty installed presets
5.	***FIX***: Looping pads not lighting up

name: 2.3 Alpha 7
body:
1.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Removed Firebase, moved to Berict API
2.	***FIX***: Preset store loading animation glitch
3.	***NEW***: Bugs and glitches

name: 2.3 Beta 1
body:
1.	***NEW***: Open presets from zip
2.	***FIX***: Preset store no connection layout glitch
3.	***FIX***: Forever looping
4.	***FIX***: Minor bug fixes

name: 2.3 Alpha 6
body:
1.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Removed pad patterns (temporary)
2.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Removed stop sound on focus loss feature (temporary)

name: 2.3 Alpha 5
body:
1.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Preset download notifications
2.	***FIX***: Preset store dialog crashing
3.	***FIX***: Preset store download status disappearing
4.	***FIX***: Preset store no connection bug
5.	***FIX***: Crashing on preset remove / install
6.	***FIX***: Toolbar glitch

name: 2.3 Alpha 4
body:
1.	***NEW***: Preset store showing installed / online presets
2.	***NEW***: Preset store connection timeout
3.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Enhanced message input in Feedbacks
4.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Icon / UI changed
5.	***FIX***: Updated version number
6.	***FIX***: Status bar glitch under API 16
7.	***FIX***: Fabric error reporting not working

name: 2.3 Alpha 3
body:

2.	***NEW***: Download notifications
3.	***NEW***: Cellular data warning dialog
4.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Fabric error reporting added
5.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Action bar glitch fixed

name: 2.3 Alpha 2
body:
1.	***NEW***: Pad reveal animations
2.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Added no connection support on Preset store
3.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Preset download cancel fixed

name: 2.3 Alpha 1
body:
1.	***NEW***: Preset store (Beta)
2.	***NEW***: Added Studio Berict Discord channel
3.	***IMPORTANT***: Tapad is free and open source now at *https://github.com/berict/Tapad*
4.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Changed progress bar style
5.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Faster loading
6.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Updated libraries
7.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Changed icons
8.	***FIX***: Alan Walker – Faded preset
1.	***FIX***: App crashing on startup

2.	***IMPROVEMENT***: Ad fallbacks
3.	***FIX***: About screen showing wrong presets
4.	***FIX***: Status bar disappearing
5.	***FIX***: Wrong icons on about screen
